name: ACUTEC
tagline: We Are Your Trusted IT Support Experts
description: ACUTEC is an IT support, services and solutions provider covering the whole of the Midlands. They deliver positive face to face, telephone and remote support. And if you need 24/7 support, they deliver friendly and helpful advice. ACUTEC'S bespoke reporting system checks your IT networks overnight and reports on any issues before you reach your desk.

locations.address: St Peters House, Church Hill, Coleshill
